making-a-blog.title: How I Set up a Blog in GitHub Pages using Blazor WASM
making-a-blog.description: This is an article about how I made this site. It specifically covers how I set up the github pages page, and the github actions pipelines.

registry-of-singletons.title: The registry of singletons pattern, a.k.a. why all my homies hate enums
registry-of-singletons.description: This is a pattern I find myself using often. Enums are great, but they have some limitations. This pattern is a way to get around those limitations.
